author: Jake Lo
text:
Absolutely worth signing up to this location especially after the renovations. Comfortable, well-spaced out, and plenty of properly-maintained equipment.
There are also 2 vending machines offering a good variety of options. The gym also has a Dyson hairdryer for quick post-shower drying.
The location being in Loyang Point also means easy access to food, 2 supermarkets, and a 7-11.
At time of signup, the staff were also professional and very welcoming.

author: Brandon T
text: Return after hiatus in 2021, the amount of equipment, the vibe and the space has improved! felt like i went to a different gym! really makes me more motivated to be back to the outlet along with new faces!

author: Yvonne Yeo 3003
text:
Dear QIF,

I would like to express my heartfelt thanks and appreciation for the excellent guidance and support you provided during my very first personal training session on 21st April 2025 at Loyang Point.

Your professionalism, patience, and encouragement made a strong impression on me. You took the time to understand my fitness goals, assess my current condition, and explain each exercise clearly. I felt both motivated and comfortable throughout the session ‚Äî something that really matters to someone just starting out.

Your positive energy and enthusiasm are contagious, and I‚Äôm genuinely looking forward to our next sessions. Thank you for making this first step into my fitness journey such a positive and empowering experience.

Keep up the amazing work!

Warm regards,
Yvonne

author: syahril54
text:
Loyang point is a very spacious and welcoming gym especially for beginners.

But to maximise the setup and space, could the area with the platform and racks be reorganised for more structured placement of weight plates and safer positioning of the racks?

author: Hey Matthew
text:
I want to express my heartfelt appreciation to the team at Anytime Fitness Loyang Point. After suffering an elbow fracture and ligament tear in January, I was unable to exercise for months.

Today, when I approached the team about resuming my membership to regain strength through light workouts (as advised by my physiotherapist), they were incredibly understanding and supportive.

They patiently explained the necessary procedures without hesitation and even went the extra mile by waiving my pro-rated payment for the month. They also gave me the option to freeze my membership if needed, demonstrating not just professionalism but genuine care for their members' well-being.

Such dedication and customer service are truly commendable. A big shoutout to the team at Anytime Fitness Loyang Point, for creating such a supportive and caring environment!

author: David
text:
Edit: Thank you for your response! That makes sense! Looking forward to more! And I think the renovation is dope and still love the staff and their effort to make the place hospitable!

Previous: Omg as much as I love yall. The new machines yall just bought are so bad...its such a waste of money and space. Please I support yall wholeheartedly, put your money and space to good use, cus this is just waste of investment my brain cant function why yall would buy such machines :'( HAHAHAHA

author: SiewNing Loh
text:
I reported that a treadmill was not functioning well, the touch screen is not working. The staff on duty responded by saying ‚Äú if you want to use this machine, you got to pull out the emergency plug‚Äù. No sign to indicate the ‚Äúadaptive function‚Äù to users. Less than 10 minutes later, another member stepped on it and the machine sped up to 10km/h just as it did when I used it.  Safety isn‚Äôt a concern for this gym.
To management, many members are very unhappy with your staff. It is only a matter of time that this gym will suffer the damages they are causing.

author: Daniel Loh
text: Yes, I had a bad experienced too. Was in the gym the previous weekend and there weee three staff at the counter. Told them politely that the heavy rock music was too loud and too heavy going for a gym. It was stressful to say the least. There was screaming one the vocals. Just unbearable. The staff looked at each other and smiled and nodded. I walked away and realised there was no change and nothing was done to change the music or to tone down the volume. Really poor service and disregard for members feedback. Hope something can be done. Not the first time I have given wrt the music choice in the gym. Got better for a weeks after the last feedback but it‚Äôs back to heavy metal soon after. Wish the management can look into the quality of staff and management of the gym.

author: saraha
text: The gym is very great as the vibes there is very overwhelming as the staff was very kind and friendly especially Rezqi and Taufiq

author: nasuha zulkepli
text: I love the vibes in AF lyp. It has such a homely environment with the staff being friendly and approachable. Not to mention the members there are easy to befriend. It definitely made my gym journey a memorable one :)

author: Eddie Noah
text:
Hi,I hope this message finds you well. I hate to be the one doing all these complaining.Im expressing my ongoing concern regarding the lack of music at the gym. There were previous complaints about this issue, and while it was temporarily resolved, the music has once again been turned off.

If there is a technical problem, I kindly request that it be addressed promptly. While bringing our own headphones is an option, it should not be considered a solution to this recurring issue. Members should not have to compensate for the gym's inability to maintain a basic amenity.

It feels as though our complaints are not being taken seriously. If this matter is not resolved soon, I will have no choice but to escalate it to higher management, as it reflects poorly on the overall management of the gym.

It is important to remember that while membership payments are crucial, providing a satisfactory experience for gym members should be a priority. I hope to see a swift resolution to this issue.

Also,as a manager of the gym,it is very unprofessional to call the gym members for help  whenever there‚Äôs ANY technical issues with the gym.

As of today,there are still NO music provided.
Otherwise,sometimes the  same song played over and over for hours.Worse,the yoga sessions music from last night were not switched off and it sounds like the gym is at Mandai Crematorium music.
Please look into this matter as the manager in charge here is totally unreliable and incompetent.

Thank you

author: Shayuslyn Sharif
text:
Really glad that I signed up as a member here! Convenient location, good variety of equipment and huge workout space. Gym members are easy-going and accommodating too. Special thanks to my personal trainer, Gabriel for helping me out with strength-training and nutrition. Really happy with my progress so far, managed to lose some weight and gain muscle mass. Workouts are far from boring, Gabriel throws in a good mix of exercises and keeps the sessions fresh. I also enjoy meal prepping now, and I'm quite sure that these basics are going to serve me well in the years to come. I'd highly recommend Gabriel if you're looking for a personal trainer. üíØ

Keep up the great work, AF Loyang Point!

author: Faizal Yusman
text: AFLP is one of the best AF gym in sg. The equipment are well equipped and maintained. The gym spacious are the best even at times the gym gets too crowded, and also the CM (Alisya) and her other staffs are very friendly. I have no complains about this gym, good place to get your body fix. Thank you AFLP.

author: WanderWithWit
text: My rating for this gym is 3.5. I really like the gym as it is spacious but the lockers are really very small. However some equipment are poorly maintained and in terms of cleanliness I would rate this gym a 3 only. If I happened to pass by this area, there is a high chance I might revisit this area.

author: Jeffery Chang
text: Been a member since day 1‚Ä¶ have visited a few other outlets‚Ä¶ this is the most spacious and has the most comprehensive &‚Äôwell maintained equipment. The fitness class instructors are also very enthusiastic in conducting the classes.

author: Rick Ee
text:
Visited this AF for the first time. I am amazed at the size of this gym! The gym has all kinds of machines (some more than one) and has many benches and racks. The only thing that the gym lacks is (unfortunately) all things cable.

Perhaps the best thing about this gym is its ambience. The gym gets plenty of sunlight and isn‚Äôt infested by the ugly purple, which makes it so much easier to go one more.

author: goh hai kuan
text:
been gymming here for 2plus years and my experience here so far has been the greatest. Gym staff here have been really nice

ps: You can consult them if you have any concerns about anything

author: Daryl
text: Used to be a member of this gym couple of years back and decided join back to early this year to get back my fitness. Was impressed with the expansion and also special thanks to Gabriel, a PT at the gym. Decided to get some extra help to boost my physical strength and cardio. He is very professional and knows how to customise the training to suit my goals. He gives good advice on how to improve my technique and form. Will recommend him if you're looking to enhance your training or sports performance.

author: dheeraj sharma
text:
Gym management not understanding about why I needed to cancel my membership and refused to allow earlier termination. They should have atleast request for documents to proof my reason.
Gym equipments need improvement, members are paying a high price for membership but equipments are not well maintained.

author: Danial Azman
text:
"I've been a member of Anytime Fitness loyang point for a few uears now and I'm absolutely loving it! The gym is always clean and well-maintained, with a great selection of equipment and machines. The staff is friendly and helpful, and the atmosphere is welcoming and motivating.

I especially appreciate the convenience of being able to access the gym 24/7 - it's great to be able to fit in a workout at any time of day or night.

Overall, I would highly recommend Anytime Fitness loyang point to anyone looking for a great gym experience. It's a fantastic value for the price, and I feel lucky to have found such a wonderful fitness community here!"

author: Hisham Uddin
text: First time going to AF Loyang today . It is really very spacious. They play really awesome music and the staffs are very friendly too .The best part for me is the Aircon seems to be controlled , unlike some AF where the users will turn on/off Aircon as they will.

author: Gabriel Chan
text: AF Loyang Point is a very good gym as the equipment variety is very wide and well maintained and the staff there is very friendly to talk to!

author: H
text:
Management can be improved.
Did not waive admin fees despite written and verbal confirmation 2 months back.
Also, past credit card information are never removed from system, have to write in to deactivate them at best.

author: Joseph TSC
text: Second time at Loyang Point gym and loving it. This place is very clean and equipment is well maintained! Smells nice too haha ample space and just really enjoyable to workout in! Might be a lil hard to find in loyang point mall but that‚Äôs okay. Keep it up you guys!

author: Kenneth Tham
text: Many gym users here fail to place their own towels on benches before proceeding to use them, or even sanitise and wipe post workout. Very disgusting and inconsiderate, and 0 enforcement from gym management.

author: cartman1981
text:
Well equipped, friendly staff and not overcrowded (yet)... Surprised at affordability having ended with FF earlier.

Be prepared to be thick skinned as there're more young folks in their teens and early 20s - this coming from a near 40yo guy:)

author: J B
text: Very clean and spacious gym. The staff is very friendly and explained EVERYTHING in detail. Looking forward to working out here.

author: JH. H
text: Great gym!!! love it! especially Jez who us very helpful with my enquiries.

author: eva shazanna
text: Really love atmosphere of this gym and the staff have been really helpful especially Jez

author: Nabil Akif
text: Friendly gym community. Staff are helpful and welcoming. Lots of equipment to play with

author: Raphael Choong
text: Staff rezqi very nice guy the gym has many good equipment and well maintain

author: Ridzwan Rashid
text: Good environment and vibes. Workers here and gym goers here are vere kind.

author: nur hamizah
text: Well equipped gym ctr. Friendly staffs. Able to answer to my enquiry in a timely manner. Thanks You Ms Victoria!

author: Mirul Faie
text: Great equipment, big space, amazing friendly staff, especially Jez

author: Rajan Dsa
text: Homely and positive vibes, paired with a people-centric staff always eager to help.

author: no no
text: few mean and arrogant ppl , worker rolled his eyes to me , also got threatened ACCIDENTLY taking a person weights , complained but no reply for days

author: Nur Shifaa Ismail
text: staff are rude and unprofessional, also very calculative and persistent for payment even though i was literally about to pay in a minute üíÄ ‚Ä¶

author: Md Zl
text: Very good la. Bigger place so you can pick up weights to have muscles and have neighbors around you yo do the same.

author: Vladimir Popovic
text: Great place, clean, good equipment, not too crowded, kind staff, all recommendations. Not to mention they're open 24/7

author: I. Ong
text: Big and spacious gym! But lack of hair dryer in toilet.

author: Me T
text: Back after a while. Didn't know about this. Wasted my time coming down.

Really really big and spacious
loads of squat racks
